radiographic_examinations.findings: Left lower quadrant demonstrates inflammatory fat stranding and multiple air loculations surrounding a segment of colon with numerous diverticula. Additional locules of partially free air throughout the upper abdomen. The liver shows a hypoattenuating lesion likely a benign cyst. The lung bases demonstrate subsegmental atelectasis and a subpleural bleb. The rectum and bladder are unremarkable with small bilateral fat-containing inguinal hernias.
